Starstorm::

"He fought like a tru idiot, you wanna meat Vlad" replied  
Startorm "He try to destroy a bot who was more powerful than him" and 
looking to Phoenix asked curiously"Wher have you seen masacres, have 
you been a soldier once in your life?"
